name: FlipPix Art - Zoo
description:
An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of a painting. Use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Art - Zoo has one zoo scene containing 36 puzzles in a variety of sizes. Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art - Zoo puzzles are designed for both the iPhone and iPad, and range from easy to very challenging levels of play.

Also included is a new 'Bonus' scene which contains an additional 44 puzzles.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
